text:
Please add hashmark printing to the FTP task in Ant.
To be able to use a construct like 

      <ftp server="svr01" userid="${user}" password="${ftp.password}" 
verbose="yes" hash="on">
         <fileset dir="${migration.dir}">
            <include name="${release.zip}"/>
         </fileset>

would be most convenient.

Thanks,

Henk de Vries
creator: henk.de.vries@myefactory.nl
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
I quickly looked into the source of NetComponents.
It seems there is a need to duplicate(variables are private) the FTP Client so 
that it supports adding a stream listener. That's not that convenient to 
duplicate things.

creator: steve_l@iseran.com
text:
we could do this, but given how the <get> task is currently working, it wont 
do you any good, as you wont see the hash marks till the upload/download is 
over. (i.e. writes to system.out are buffered till the end of the line, then 
sent to the log)
